attributes.action: Fine the Brexit Leave Campaign the equivalent of the economic costs of Brexit.
attributes.additional_details: To pay for their crimes, we call upon the relevant authorities to calculate the full economic cost that Brexit has caused this country thus far – and for that sum to be shared as a financial penalty between all those implicated in campaign irregularities.
attributes.background: The leaders of Brexit enterprise must be held accountable and pay justly for the political and economic suffering to which they have doomed the right-thinking workers and taxpayers of our United Kingdom.
